Name: Average time from 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time from 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' to influence 'SW-EIC Major Revision' decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in the review process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: Average time it takes 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time for 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: Elapsed time between 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Time from 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' to 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in the context of achieving a faster review cycle
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and the end of the case

Name: 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' Cycle Time in comparison to 'SW-Reviewer Declined' Cycle Time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' grouped by 'case:concept:name'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
